## Problem #3 **(20 points)**
The Mauna Loa Observatory in Hawaii has recorded atmospheric COâ‚‚ concentrations since 1958. The dataset `mauna-loa.csv` contains monthly mean $CO_2$ values (in parts per million, ppm).
